DOC.brief_summary: Controlled ovarian hyperstimulation gonadotropin integral part various stimulation protocol patient undergo in-vitro fertilization ( IVF ) Assisted Reproductive Technologies ( ART ) intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) . The hormonal control multiple follicular growth maturation critical part ART procedures since maximizes yield embryos transfer , thus increase cumulative pregnancy rate . Recent study show efficacy myo-inositol ( MI ) supplementation simple highly effective treatment order improve oocyte quality patient undergo IVF . Indeed , previously show MI follicular fluid ( FF ) concentration reliable predictor oocyte quality . High MI concentration FF directly correlate high oocyte embryo quality . Another stereoisomer Inositol successfully use clinical practice D-chiro-inositol ( DCI ) . In particular , DCI supplementation use restore ovulation hyperglycemic PCOS patient . In present study aim compare MI versus DCI supplementation oocyte quality woman undergo IVF-ET
